branchCategory.name: Body Ported Manifolds
branchCategory.description: <p> The VK series is available as 3 and 5 port solenoid, direct poppet, rubber seal valve. It meets copper free specifications as all parts in contact with fluids are made of non-copper materials. A compact valve (width 18 x length 68mm), the VK series is available in a body ported or base mounted style.</p>

branchItem.name: VV3K3, Body Ported Manifold, Type 20/21
branchItem.description: <p> The VK series is available as 3 and 5 port solenoid, direct poppet, rubber seal valve. It meets copper free specifications as all parts in contact with fluids are made of non-copper materials. A compact valve (width 18 x length 68mm), the VK series is available in a body ported or base mounted style.</p>
